channel.title: NCR on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in NCR on Machine Learning

item.title: Google NCR (No Country Redirection)
item.description: To avoid contry redirection, use the following search string in chrome as the default engine: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&gws_rd=cr There are some extensions to force another redirection to .com, but it disturbs the “back page” action.
